code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LandingPage(){const[forms,setForms]=useState([]);const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/forms').then(response=>{setForms(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error("There was an error fetching the forms!",error);});},[]);const filteredForms=forms.filter(form=>form.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Available Feedback Forms"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search for a form...",className:"search-bar",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"form-list",children:filteredForms.map(form=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"form-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/form/".concat(form._id),children:form.title})},form._id))})]});}export default LandingPage;
